node.title: How Mainstream Media Destroys Families
node.description: This presentation will address why God designed the family to be a parallel of the triune God. The greatest witness and evidence of the power of Christianity is a well-ordered, well-disciplined family. This commends the truth as nothing else can, for it is a living witness of the gospel’s practical power upon the heart. Some of Hollywood’s biggest movies undermine key family roles, making wholesome family values seem undesirable. This seminar addresses how Hollywood attacks marriages and incites rebellion among the youth.
